Html:
Hi,

I have a tree-view with a lot of data and branches and I want to restrict the selection of nodes to certain level lets say level 3 and when user select multiple nodes or one, user will drag the nodes and drop it on the text-box and full path of the nodes will appear in the text-box or list-box.

Let me know can I achieve this with this Tree-view.

Thanks,
Attiqe
